WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Attachment_WWS_Data.description: Text attribute identifying a unique ID for Attachment.

validation.validation: [periodEndDate] must be within [yearLimit] years of the current date.
[organizationCode] is assigned to more than 1 pay group. Use a WID or Organization_Reference_ID for the pay group.
[organizationCode] isn't a valid code. Use a valid code, WID, or Organization_Reference_ID for the pay group.
There aren't any Payslips to delete for the [worker], [payGroup], [periodEndDate], [paymentDate], and [checkNumberText].
The Payslip for [worker], [payGroup], [periodEndDate], [paymentDate], and check number [checkNumber] doesn't have an attachment. To create the Payslip, add the attachment to the request.
[periodEndDate] must be a valid period for [payGroup].
[payGroup] must be active.
[worker] must be in [payGroup] currently or in the past.
[periodEndDate] matches to periods of multiple run categories, Run Category is required.
Run Category does not match the [payGroup]'s run categories.

External_Tax_Document_Data.description: Specify the Tax Form Classification for the External Tax Document. Available options include Original, Amended, Additional, and Canceled. Specify either the WID or "External_Payroll_Form_Classification_ID=12345".

validation.validation: The Tax Document for [worker], [organization], [issuedDate] [taxForm], and [taxYear] doesn't have an attachment. To create the Tax Document, add the attachment to the request.
There aren't any Tax Documents to delete for the [worker], [organization], [issuedDate] [taxForm], and [taxYear].
[organizationCode] is assigned to more than 1 organization. Use a WID or Organization_Reference_ID for the organization.
[organizationCode] isn't a valid code. Use a valid code, WID, or Organization_Reference_ID for the organization.
The tax document for [worker], [organization], [issuedDate] [taxForm], and [taxYear] can't be uploaded. [workerName] already has the maximum number of uploaded tax documents and other documents.

validation.validation: [organizationCode] isn't a valid code. Use a valid code, WID, or Organization_Reference_ID for the organization.
The Other Document for [worker], [organization], [documentType], and [serialID] doesn't have an attachment. To create the Other Document, add the attachment to the request.
